'''Rifaet''' is a member of [[Haravatat]] who has been mentioned by several [[NPC]]s in Sumeru as one of the candidates for the Grand Conservator position, alongside [[Vikram]]. Rifaet's supporters believe he is more of a researcher and an intellectual than Vikram is.

==Profile==
{{Quote|Few can be like Rifaet, who can do research alone and produce lots of results on top of that.|Zinat, about her collaboration with [[Kshahrewar]]}}
